body_content.explanation: A law, agreement, etc. that is executory has been agreed, but does not yet have an effect and will begin in future:
examples: We would like some flexibility to cancel executory contracts.
Some judgements may be modified after becoming executory.

body_content.explanation: relating to the arrangements for making decisions and managing businesses:
examples: Only they have the executory power to make a decision about this matter.
You will need to pay property taxes and other executory costs related to the sale of the house.
